testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the test application page..............................passed When the user enters login username "testuser"..............................passed And the user enters login password "password123"............................passed And the user clicks the login button........................................passed Then the user should see login message "Login successful!"..................passed

testcase.name: Failed login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the test application page..............................passed When the user enters login username "invaliduser"...........................passed And the user enters login password "wrongpassword"..........................passed And the user clicks the login button........................................passed Then the user should see login message "Invalid credentials!"...............passed
